title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.49 - Bond discount
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.49 - Bond discount

State Regulations

The excess of the face amount of a bond or class of bonds
over the net amount yielded from its sale. On the books and balance sheet of
the issuer it appears as a deferred charge. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.49

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
